description: You could blame it on Christmas amid a minor rash of articles and commentary in the United States on ending the war in Ukraine. Read more at straitstimes.com.
title: The war in Ukraine must end soon
title_page: The war in Ukraine must end soon | The Straits Times
maintext:
You could blame it on Christmas amid a minor rash of articles and commentary in the United States on ending the war in Ukraine.
Some call it a fool’s errand; some say it is wishful thinking. Perhaps it is both. But it is in fact Christmas – so a conversation on how to end the war seems appropriate.
